module.name: Ring Groups
module.description: Creates a group of extensions that all ring together. Extensions can be rung all at once, or in various hunt configurations. Additionally, external numbers are supported, and there is a call confirmation option where the callee has to confirm if they actually want to take the call before the caller is transferred.
